name: Chronomancer (acornellier)
description:
I've spent about a week on this game so far. I should be spending at least another few days or so on it before moving on. I'm quite proud of the starting screen.

  • Castle art https://szadiart.itch.io/pixel-platformer-castle
  • Music https://freesound.org/people/SquashedSkinner/sounds/564495/
  • Character pixel art and animations were done by me!

https://github.com/acornellier/chronomancer
